chapter.text: 68|1|noon aur shapath hai lekhanee (qalam) kee tatha usakee[1] jise vo likhate hain.
68|2|nahin hai aap, apane paalanahaar ke anugrah se paagal.
68|3|tatha nishchay pratiphal (badala) hai aapake lie anant.
68|4|tatha nishchay hee aap bade susheel hain.
68|5|to sheeghr aap dekh lenge tatha ve (kaafir bhee) dekh lenge.
68|6|ki paagal kaun hai.
68|7|vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee adhik jaanata hai use, jo kupath ho gaya usakee raah se aur vahee adhik jaanata hai unhen, jo seedhee raah par hain.
68|8|to aap baat na maanen jhuthalaane vaalon kee.
68|9|ve chaahate hain ki aap dheele ho jaayen, to ve bhee dheele ho[1] jaayen.
68|10|aur baat na maanen[1] aap kisee adhik shapath lene vaale, heen vyakti kee.
68|11|jo vyang karane vaala, chugaliyaan khaata phirata hai.
68|12|bhalaee se rokane vaala, atyaachaaree, bada paapee hai.
68|13|ghamandee hai aur isake pashchaat kuvansh (varn sankar) hai.
68|14|isalie ki vah dhan tatha putron vaala hai.
68|15|jab padhee jaatee hai usapar hamaaree aayaten, to kahata haih ye poorvajon kee kalpit kathaayen hain.
68|16|sheeghr hee ham daag laga denge usake soond[1] par.
68|17|nihsandeh, hamane unhen pareeksha mein daala[1] hai, jis prakaar baag vaalon ko pareeksha mein daala tha. jab unhonne shapath lee ki avashy tod lenge usake phal bhor hote hee.
68|18|aur in sha allaah (yadi allaah ne chaaha) nahin kaha.
68|19|to phir gaya us baag par ek kuchakr, aapake paalanahaar kee or se aur ve soye hue the.
68|20|to vah ho gaya jaise ujaad khetee ho.
68|21|ab ve ek-doosare ko pukaarane lage bhor hote heeh
68|22|ki tadake chalo apanee khetee par, yadi phal todane hain.
68|23|phir ve chal diye aapas mein chupake-chupake baaten karate hue.
68|24|ki kadaapi na aane paaye us (baag) ke bheetar aaj tumhaare paas koee nirdhan.
68|25|aur praatah hee pahunch gaye ki ve phal tod sakenge.
68|26|phir jab use dekha to kahaah nishchay ham raah bhool gaye.
68|27|balki ham vanchit ho[1] gaye.
68|28|to unamen se bichale bhaee ne kahaah kya mainne tumase nahin kaha tha ki tum (allaah kee) pavitrata ka varnan kyon nahin karate
68|29|ve kahane lageh pavitr hai hamaara paalanahaar! vaastav mein, ham hee atyaachaaree the.
68|30|phir sammukh ho gaye, ek-doosare kee ninda karate hue.
68|31|kahane lageh haay afsos! ham hee vidrohee the.
68|32|sambhav hai hamaara paalanahaar hamen badale mein pradaan kare isase uttam (baag). ham apane paalanahaar hee kee or roochi rakhate hain.
68|33|aise hee yaatana hotee hai aur aakhirat (paralok) kee yaatana isase bhee badee hai. kaash ve jaanate
68|34|nihsandeh, sadaachaariyon ke lie unake paalanahaar ke paas sukhon vaale svarg hain.
68|35|kya ham aagyaakaariyon[1] ko paapiyon ke samaan kar denge
68|36|tumhen kya ho gaya hai? tum kaisa nirnay kar rahe ho
68|37|kya tumhaare paas koee pustak hai, jisamen tum padhate ho
68|38|ki tumhen vahee milega, jo tum chaahoge
68|39|ya tumane hamase shapathen le rakhee hain, jo pralay tak chalee jaayengee ki tumhen vahee milega jisaka tum nirnay karoge
68|40|aap unase poochhiye ki unamen kaun isakee zamaanat leta hai
68|41|kya unake kuchh saajhee hain? phir to ve apane saajhiyon ko laayen,[1] yadi ve sachche hain.
68|42|jis din pindalee khol dee jaayegee aur vah bulaaye jaayenge sajda karane ke lie, to (sajda) nahin kar sakenge.
68|43|unakee aankhen jhukee hongee aur unapar apamaan chhaaya hoga. ve (sansaar mein) sajda karane ke lie bulaaye jaate rahe jabaki ve svasth the.
68|44|atah, aap chhod den mujhe tatha unhen, jo jhuthala rahe hain is baat (quraan) ko, ham unhen dheere-dheere kheench laayenge,[1] is prakaar ki unhen gyaan bhee nahin hoga.
68|45|tatha ham unhen avasar de rahe hain.[1] vastutah, hamaara upaay sudrdh hai.
68|46|to kya aap maang kar rahe hain kisee paarishramik[1] kee, to ve bojh se dabe ja rahe hain.
68|47|ya unake paas gaib ka gyaan hai, jise ve likh[1] rahe hain
68|48|to aap dhairy rakhen apane paalanahaar ke nirnay tak aur na ho jaayen machhalee vaale ke samaan.[1] jab usane pukaara aur vah shokapoorn tha.
68|49|aur yadi na pa letee use usake paalanahaar kee daya, to vah phenk diya jaata banjar mein aur vah buree dasha mein hota.
68|50|phir chun liya use usake paalanahaar ne aur bana diya use sadaachaariyon mein se.
68|51|aur aisa lagata hai ki jo kaafipar ho gaye, ve avashy phisala denge aapako apanee aankhon se (ghoor kar) jab ve sunate hon quraan ko tatha kahate hain ki vah avashay paagal hai.
68|52|jabaki ye quraan to bas ek[1] shiksha hai, poore sansaar vaasiyon ke lie.
